description:
Wave is the most affordable mobile money network in Burkina Faso, Côte d'Ivoire, The Gambia, Mali, Senegal and Uganda :)

- Send money for only 1%
- Deposit and withdraw for FREE at any of our agents
- Pay bills WITHOUT FEES
- Buy airtime for all networks directly using the app (in Mali, Senegal and Uganda)
- Call our toll-free numbers for support: 
    - Burkina Faso: 80001257
    - Côte D'Ivoire: 1315
    - Mali: 80002221
    - Senegal: 200600
    - Uganda: 0800303064
    - The Gambia: 1222

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

- Take payments in-person by scanning customers' QR cards to take payments in-person
- Send links to customers to collect payments remotely
- See online and in-person customer payment receipts instantly in the app
- Withdraw your balance for free to your Wave wallet, at any Wave agent or by wire transfer
- Call our toll-free numbers for support -- 200600 in Senegal and 1315 in Côte d'Ivoire

Cette application permet aux clients détenteur d'un compte « MOOV MONEY » de :

- Transférez et recevoir de l'argent au niveau national « Burkina Faso »
- Transférez et recevoir de l'argent au niveau international des pays de l'UMOA « Bénin, Côte d'Ivoire, Mali, Niger et Togo »
- Retire de l'argent auprès des points cash de MOOV Money
- Effectuer des transactions bancaire « Banque to Wallet et Wallet to Banque »
- Effectuer des recharges en crédit téléphonique (voix et Data) et forfaits MOOV Africa
- Payer ses factures d'électricité et d'eau,
- Payer ses redevances d'impôts et taxes
- Payer les abonnement TV : CANAL+
- Payer les redevances des kits solaires et des compteurs d'électricité
- Payer les biens et les présentations de services (carburant, alimentation ...)
- Consulter l'historique de toutes les transactions

Ligdi est une application innovante et sécurisée qui simplifie les transferts d'argent au Burkina Faso. Envoyez, recevez et gérez votre argent directement depuis votre smartphone, en toute simplicité et sécurité.

Fonctionnalités principales :
Transferts rapides et sécurisés : Effectuez des transferts d'argent partout au Burkina Faso.
Retraits et dépôts facilités : Retirez et déposez de l'argent facilement grâce à Ligdi.
Support client 24h/7j : Assistance réactive pour résoudre tous vos soucis en temps réel.
Historique des transactions : Suivi détaillé de vos opérations pour une gestion transparente.
KYC et sécurité avancée : Vérification d’identité et protection des données grâce au chiffrement.
Interface intuitive : Facile à utiliser, même pour les débutants.
Pourquoi choisir Ligdi ?
Accessibilité : Compatible avec toutes les plateformes mobiles, même avec des connexions Internet faibles.
Économie : Frais de transaction réduits pour rendre le service accessible à tous.
Soutien local : Développée pour répondre aux besoins spécifiques du marché burkinabè.
Téléchargez Ligdi maintenant et effectuez vos transferts d'argent en toute confiance !

Cette application permet aux clients détenteurs d'un compte Coris Money d'effectuer des transactions financières variées (transferts d'argent, paiement de factures, paiement de biens et services, etc.) avec leur téléphone mobile en toute simplicité et en toute sécurité.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Sank Money est la solution africaine du Mobile Money. L'application permet de :
- Transférer de l'argent à ses proches
- Effectuer des paiements marchand
- Recharger son crédit d'appel et forfait internet
- Paiement des factures

Découvrez une nouvelle expérience bancaire pratique et intuitive avec notre application mobile. Restez informé(e) en temps réel grâce à des notifications instantanées pour toutes vos opérations bancaires. Gagnez en efficacité en gérant facilement vos chèques, en suivant vos transactions et en demandant des chéquiers en quelques clics.

Payez vos factures rapidement et en toute simplicité. Notre application vous permet de régler vos paiements et de consulter l'historique de vos transactions en un rien de temps. Gérez vos abonnements et effectuez des paiements ponctuels directement depuis votre mobile.

Téléchargez l'application dès maintenant et simplifiez votre vie bancaire.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Gate is committed to providing secure and reliable trading services for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over4,000 cryptocurrencies. With over 12 years of industry experience and 44 million users, Gate has become the preferred platform for crypto investors worldwide. 

A full-range crypto exchange with everything you want to trade. BTC, ETH, XRP, HBAR, MOODENG, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, EOS, CRV, ORDI, TAO, LTC, SHIB, JASMY, ENA, SEI, AVAX, RATS, XLM, FTM, APEPE, XRP5L, POL, RSR, FIL, ALGO, CFX, BCH, ETC, SUNDOG, KAIA, PNUT, BNB, NEAR, MAF, BAN, EML, BIGTIME, TOKEN, VIRTUAL, TIA, SATS, BOME, UNI, OM, and over4,000 more assets.

A full-featured crypto exchange offering all the top products in one place.
• Spot Trading: Supports full-range assets — including newly-listed tokens, margin trading, BRC-20, AI, MEME, RWA, DePin, ETH2.0 staking, ETFs, 5x leveraged ETFs, Layer 2, platform tokens, DeFi, and more.
• Futures:
Perpetuals, delivery contracts and more — covering 100+ markets with 0 maker fees. Enjoy points redemption and various rewards.
• Alpha:
Gate Alpha provides one-click access to all on-chain assets, supporting the widest range of tokens with minute-level listing speed. Earn Alpha points through holding and trading, which can be used to participate in token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events, unlocking additional benefits.
• Web3:
A new Web3 portal through which you can explore Gate Layer, Gate Perp DEX, Gate Fun, Meme Go, Web3 Launchpad, and more, and dive straight into the on-chain world.
• Launchpool:
Stake GT, USDT, ETH, and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Hourly airdrops, low entry, and high yield help you seize new market opportunities easily.
• CandyDrop:
Complete simple tasks like trading, depositing or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and join lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barrier and huge rewards.
• HODLer:
Hold just 1 GT to automatically receive airdrops from multiple projects, with no lockups or extra actions required. Simply hold, and earn.
• Launchpad:
Access early-stage, high-quality token launches and share the upside. Strict screening ensures quality, and fair mechanisms protect your participation rights.
• Earn:
Offers a variety of wealth-management products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Funds, Crypto Loan, and more. Stake BTC, ETH, and GT to earn higher APR. VIP users enjoy extra benefits.
• Bots:
Supports a full range of trading bots across spot and futures, including Grid Bot, Martingale Bot, Smart Rebalance Bot, Arbitrage Bot, Inter-Exchange Arbitrage Bot, Infinite Grid, Margin Grid, CTA-Expert Bot, Signal Bot, and more.
• Copy Trading:
Gate Copy Trading allows users to instantly replicate the spot and futures trades of professional traders or lead traders, enabling rapid execution of trading strategies with an overall position synchronization rate of up to 99.99%.
• Community:
Stay at the forefront of crypto news and discussions with Gate Community. Explore real-time updates, live streams, and hot-topic chats to catch upcoming events and breaking news.

- First exchange to commit to 100% Proof of Reserves
Gate's reserves cover over 200 digital assets, leveraging Merkle trees and zero-knowledge proof technology to fully secure user funds, with an excess reserve exceeding $11.676 billion.
- Premium experience with 24/7 support
We provide 24/7 customer support, allowing users to contact Gate anytime through support channels for the best service experience. For any inquiries, you can email us at: support@gate.com.

Join Our Community
X: https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Application marchande complète permettant aux commerçants de gérer aisément leurs ventes, leurs caisses et toutes leurs transactions financières. Elle offre un suivi en temps réel des opérations, des rapports détaillés sur les encaissements et les performances, ainsi qu’une interface fluide, moderne et sécurisée pour centraliser l’activité du point de vente. Idéale pour les magasins et partenaires commerciaux, elle simplifie la gestion quotidienne, améliore la traçabilité et favorise la croissance du commerce digital.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Wherever, whenever …get the Ecobank Mobile app and make everyday banking as easy as ABC!

The Ecobank Mobile app allows you to enjoy our banking services instantly and conveniently on your mobile device. The app provides you with an easy channel to manage your account and perform financial transactions in a simple and secured manner. The app gives you access to affordable banking services and more wherever you are on your mobile 24/7 ,365 days a year. The app also gives you access to the Ecobank Xpress Account.

It is one unified application for all the 33 where Ecobank Operates.

Features on the Ecobank Mobile App include: 

- Send Money to 33 African Countries instantly
- Open an Ecobank Xpress Account
- Check Account balances & transaction history
- Airtime TopUp for Self / Other
- Pay Billers & Merchants
- Account Statement Request
- Block Card / Cheque Request
- Locate the nearest Ecobank Branch / ATM / Xpress Point
- Attach Other Bank cards
- Cardless withdrawal

Go digital! Get the Ecobank Mobile App.

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. You can send money directly from your debit card or bank account (depending on your location)

Why use TapTap Send to send money?

- Fast money transfers – most transfers arrive in minutes

- Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees when you send money

- Great exchange rates – we negotiate daily to offer you more value when you transfer funds

- Convenient transfers – send from your phone, anytime, anywhere

- Multiple payout options – transfer money to mobile wallets, bank accounts, or for cash pickup

You can send money to over 50 countries, including:

Pakistan

India

Nigeria

Ghana

Brazil

Mexico


…and many more. Explore the full list at taptapsend.com.

Send money from:

United Kingdom

United States

European Union

Canada

United Arab Emirates

Australia

We work with leading banks and financial partners to ensure your money reaches where it’s needed. Transfer money to:

Mobile wallets: Orange Money, MTN, JazzCash, Easypaisa, bKash

Bank accounts: HBL, UBL, Access Bank, Fidelity Bank, and many more

Cash pickup: Available at trusted partner bank branches in select countries

TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We understand the challenges of sending money internationally and are here to make every money transfer easier, faster, and more affordable. If you ever need support, our friendly team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Our Mission
We believe that diaspora communities deserve fast, secure, and fair ways to send money home. For too long, sending money internationally has been expensive and difficult. We’re changing that — by lowering costs, reducing delays, and improving your experience every time you transfer money.

Download TapTap Send and start sending money today.
Transfer money home — fast, safe, and stress-free.

*FX Gains apply
*Exchange rates for illustrative purposes only. Exchange rates are dynamic and are subject to fluctuation.

Investing.com offers a set of financial tools covering a wide variety of global and local financial instruments. A one-stop-shop for traders and investors.

REAL-TIME DATA
Live quotes and charts for over 100,000 financial instruments, traded on over 70 global exchanges.
Track major global indices, stocks, bonds, commodities, interest rates, and futures and options

ECONOMIC CALENDAR
Live updates on global economic events customized to your personal interests.
Our real-time Economic Calendar is used by top traders and investors to track market-moving events as they are announced, making it easy to track market impact.

PERSONALIZED PORTFOLIO
Add your favorite financial instruments and their holdings to your portfolio.
Build your own customized watchlist and keep track of stock quotes, currencies, commodities, indices, ETFs and bonds - all synced with your Investing.com account. Your personal Watchlist can be accessed anytime from your menu, providing you with real-time prices, and the Holdings Portfolio shows you your total assets value 24/7.

ALERTS
Our Alerts system allows you to receive customizable alerts for any instrument, economic event or new analysis articles. For all 100,000 financial instruments, you can set up notifications for a specific price, change by %, or Volume. All pushed by request, and synced with the website.

NEWS & ANALYSIS
Breaking news, videos, updates and analysis on global financial markets, as well as technology, politics and business.
Be the first to read the latest on stocks, commodities, and the global economy.


FINANCIAL TOOLS
Quick access to all of our world-class tools, including: Economic Calendar, Earnings Calendar, Technical Summary, Currency Converter, Market Quotes, advanced charts and more.

Outsmart the Market and Unlock Enterprise-Quality, Actionable Analysis and Insights with Investing PRO.

 Exclusive Features:
-100% Ad-Free Experience
-Access To 100+ Fundamental Metrics
-Fair Value Estimates Made With Machine Learning
-Interactive Peer Comparison Tools
-Company Health Scores and Sector Rankings
...and many more Advanced Financial Tools

Investing PRO is a paid subscription service. 

ALREADY A MEMBER?
Sign-in and continue where you left off by syncing your portfolio and personal alerts between all of your devices.

SOCIAL
Join our growing community of traders and investors and share articles to Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

COMMODITY PRICES
Follow up-to-the-second commodity prices, including: Gold, Silver, Copper, Platinum, Crude Oil, Brent Oil and Natural Gas.

MAJOR STOCKS
Track stock market leaders: Apple Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL), Bank of America Corporation (BAC), Tesla (TSLA), General Electric Company (GE), Cisco Systems, Inc. (CSCO), American Express Company (AXP), Lloyds Banking (LLOY), Vodafone Group (VOD), Amazon (AMZN), Nike (NKE), Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Barclays (BARC), Netflix (NFLX), and many more.

GLOBAL INDICES
Follow data from all major stock market indices, including:
■ U.S: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ, SmallCap 2000
■ Americas: Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA

LigdiCash is a pan-African digital wallet, available in Burkina Faso, Côte d’Ivoire, Mali, Niger, Togo, Benin, DR Congo, and Senegal.

Reliable, fast, and secure, it allows you to:

    Send money instantly

    Top up your wallet

    Withdraw funds to an agency or Mobile Money account

    Buy airtime and internet bundles

    Pay water and electricity bills

    Create and link VISA cards for online payments

    Pay for your everyday digital services

Security first: LigdiCash is PCI/DSS certified, meeting international payment security standards.

Eversend is your go to app, offering you a full range of financial services, straight from your mobile phone. Unlike banks, we don’t have hidden fees, inconvenient operating hours and inflexible support. Instead, we offer instant money transfers to mobile money & free transfers to Eversend accounts; anytime, from anywhere in the world, with 24/7 support.

Open an account for free in under 5 minutes and enjoy full financial freedom!

Banks secretly overcharge you in foreign exchange fees when you use your local currency card to make payments online. Create an Eversend virtual dollar Visa card and save up to 13% in fees. 

Money Transfer
Send money to mobile money or Eversend accounts in Kenya, Rwanda & Uganda
Send money to bank accounts in Nigeria instantly 
Sending to Eversend accounts is completely free
Money transfers are instant

Multi currency Accounts and Currency Exchange

Adding Money to your Eversend Account
You can use mobile money in Ghana, Kenya, Rwanda or Uganda to add money OR;
Use a credit/debit card (VISA/Mastercard) in all supported countries and add money in USD (or NGN in Nigeria, UGX in Uganda, KES in Kenya, and TZS in Tanzania)

Additional Features
Electricity Payments in Uganda, never think twice about your bills again by conveniently setting up recurring payments 
Airtime available for purchase for Ghana, Kenya, Tanzania & Uganda
Eversend.me links that allow you to be paid instantly from anyone, even if they do not have an Eversend account. Go to MORE - Profile - Tag to set up your Eversend.me link

Clearly displayed on the ‘Earn’ tab in the app

We are building a Human Network powered by InterLink ID to enable Unique Data Training and Decentralized Federated Learning. 

It leverages Proof of Humanity, advanced AI, ZK (Zero-Knowledge) proof, and biometric verification to enable secure identity authentication. With a human-centric design, we prioritize individual rights, privacy, and autonomy, ensuring full control over identities in a transparent, trustworthy environment.

InterLink Network, built on the InterLink ID platform, redefines Web3 accessibility with secure face recognition, making your face the key to seamless authentication. Key features include: InterLink ID Sign Up/ Log in, InterLink Network Numbers, Mini Apps, Airdrop & Rewards, Referral Program, News & Updates, etc.

Join over 1 million people who trust LemFi to send money overseas to their loved ones. Whether you're transferring funds to Europe, Africa, Asia, or Latin America, we make it easy and affordable. With LemFi, you can send remittances from the United Kingdom, United States, Canada, and several European countries (including but not limited to France, Germany, Spain, Belgium, Italy, Ireland, Portugal, and the Netherlands) to destinations like Pakistan, India, Nigeria, Ghana, China, Uganda, Kenya, Senegal, Brazil, Tanzania, Ivory Coast, Cameroon, Benin, Rwanda, Ethiopia, France, Spain, Portugal and more—at very low or even zero transfer fees depending on the destination.


REFER A FRIEND AND EARN MONEY
Invite friends to join LemFi and earn rewards for every successful referral. Experience the benefits of fast borderless payments with low or zero transfer fees, depending on the country, and share the advantages with those you care about.


HOLD AND EXCHANGE MONEY IN DIFFERENT CURRENCIES
Manage and exchange money effortlessly with our multi-currency platform. Hold funds in Euros, British Pounds Sterling, Canadian Dollars, United States Dollars, and more. Enjoy competitive exchange rates and the flexibility to send money globally, wherever you are.


TRANSFER FEES
Unlock financial freedom with our transparent, low-fee or zero fee transfers. Depending on your destination, enjoy either minimal or fee-free transactions without any hidden charges. Transfer funds seamlessly to countries such as Brazil, Pakistan, China, India, Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, and beyond.






EXTRA BENEFITS
Receive real-time notifications when your funds arrive.
Enjoy 24/7 customer support whenever you need assistance.


LemFi is fully registered with the FCA in the UK, FINTRAC in Canada, FinCEN in the United States, and other relevant authorities worldwide.

UBA is providing a completely enhanced mobile banking experience to its customers with this new app. Banking services are easily accessible and on the go through new features such as:

• Quick log-in within a few seconds with the biometric option on devices that support this feature
• Faster navigation with the sliding menu available on all user sessions
• Fewer, more intuitive screens enhancing user experience
• ATM/Branch locator
• 24-hour customer service support via live chat 
• Quick selection of phone numbers from device contacts list for airtime top up
• Favourites list creation for easier transactions
• Auto reminders for recurrent bill payments and transfers

Manage your accounts, send money, top-up airtime, schedule your bills, save for your goals, and much more...
 
The UBA Mobile App is your Personal Financial Manager and It's Made for you!
 
What's great about the new UBA Mobile App? Everything!
 
You can:
Set spending limit
Schedule and pay bills
Make transfers
Get instant notifications
Save for your goals
Open a new account
Interact in multiple languages
Sort out transaction disputes easily
Find a branch or ATM near you
Lock, freeze, cancel and block your card
Organise your dashboard
Select themes to suit your mood
Wave over your phone camera to hide your balance
Send money to phone numbers
Confirm, request, and stop cheques
 
To get started
 
If you have a UBA account, select Sign-up and register as a new user by choosing from any of the options below:
1.      UBA Debit/Prepaid Card
2.      UBA Secure Pass
3.      USSD PIN
4.      Activation Code Only (limited access)
5.      In-branch activation
 
If you do not have a UBA account
1.      Click the menu on the top-left corner of your app
2.      Select "Open an Account"
3.      Choose your preferred account type
4.      Fill in your details and your account number will be sent to you via SMS
5.      Conclude your signup process
6.      Start Banking
